articles.author: Nick Cawley
articles.title: US Dollar (DXY) Latest: Jobs Data, FOMC Minutes Set to Drive EUR/USD and GBP/USD - DailyFX
articles.description: Three separate US jobs reports are set to be released this week, starting today, and these along with the latest FOMC minutes will define US dollar price action over the coming days.
articles.content:
GBP/USD, EUR/USD Prices, Analysis and Charts
  • JOLTs, ADP, and NFP reports released this week.
  • How dovish was Fed Chair Powell at the last FOMC meeting?
